code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{fetchTestimonials}from'../utils/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Proof=()=>{const[testimonials,setTestimonials]=useState([{text:"Resconate moved us from idea to launch without breaking pace.
